name: The Good Old Days (Esguinha)
description:
This is a game made for the mini-jam "Memories".This is my very first Jam with my second game created.I am very happy to have participated in this jam and to finish this project.

In this adventure you help an old man get to his "final destanation".Through his memories it will be revealed secrets such as (platforms,obstacles,etc).

W and D -----------------MOVE                                                                                                                              SPACE--------------------JUMP                                                                                                                              Left Mouse Button -----MEMORIES
